pages.text: Kangaroos are neutral creatures that can be found in the Savannas and Badlands.$(br2)You can breed them giving them Dead Bush or Grass and they can be tameable with Carrots.$(br2)Tameable Kangaroos can be ordered to Sit, Wander and Follow. You can equip them a Sword, a Helmet and even a Chestplate.
You can heal hurted Kangaroos give them vegetable base food, like Bread.

On death they may drop Kangaroo Meat, that can be ate or cooked to make Cooked Kangaroo Meat.$(br2)They may drop Kangaroo Hide too that can be used to craft common Leather, an special Banner Pattern or even an $(l:patchouli:armors/outback_leggings)Outback Leggins$(/l) too.
